channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloud Foundry -- CF CLI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloud Foundry -- CF CLI

item.title: CVE-2019-3781|2024-09-16T21:02:38.569Z -- cloud%20foundry -- cf%20cli
item.description: Cloud Foundry CLI, versions prior to v6.43.0, improperly exposes passwords when verbose/trace/debugging is turned on. A local unauthenticated or remote authenticated malicious user with access to logs may gain part or all of a users password.
